Summary: Bright starlike object, stationary at times then moving back and forth in ways no aircrafts could.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Camarillo
There were no other sightings in Camarillo on or around September 3rd 2012
divs: Sighting Details The bedrooms in the house were being painted so I slept on the couch. I kept waking up every hour throughout the night drenched in sweat probably because I am taking the dietary supplement creatine and drinking lots of water. At approximately 4:24 a.m. I am awake again and looking out the window in front of me at a bright object that looked like a star but brighter. There were 2 for about 15 minutes and when I came back from the bathroom there was just 1. It moved back and forth from different direcions in ways no normal aircraft could. After about 30 minutes I woke up my mother to see so I could have some verification and not be that "crazy guy". She witnessed it to and by then I had been watching it for 45 minutes and I decided to go back to sleep. I opened my eyes a few times every couple minutes to see it still there. Then next time I woke up around 6 when dusk was setting in it was gone. I don't have video capabilities on my oldschool blackberry which was low on battery and I only had a car charger. I'm one who would probably believe in ghosts before ufo's but I know what I saw and I know theres going to be a division between those who will take my word.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
